Deflect Arrows: No damage from ranged hit 1/rd
Diehard: Remain conscious, stable, and able to act with negative HP
Disruptive: +4 foe defensive spell DC
Double Slice: Add full Str modifier to off-hand damage
Exhausting Critical: Critical hit causes foe exhaustion
Far Shot: -1 range penalty
Gorgon's Fist: Unarmed attack vs. slowed foe staggers (DC 19 Fort neg)
Great Cleave: Cleave w/out limit
Greater Bull Rush: +2 Bull Rush checks, AOO on Bull Rushed foes
Greater Disarm: +2 disarm checks, disarmed weapons land 15' away
Greater Feint: Feinted foe loses Dex bonus for 1 rd
Greater Grapple: +2 grapple checks, maintain grapple as move action
Greater Overrun: +2 overrun checks, AOO on foes knocked prone
Greater Penetrating Strike: Focused weapons ignore DR 5/- or DR 10/any

Greater Trip: +2 trip checks, AOO on tripped foes

Improved Overrun: No AOO on Overrun, +2 Overrun check, +2 Overrun CMD, foe cannot avoid

Precise Shot: No penalty on shot into melee

Scorpion Style: Unarmed hit slows foe to 5' for 1 rd (DC 19 Fort neg)
Shatter Defenses: Fearful struck foes flat-footed for 1 rd
Shield Master: No penalty on shield attacks, apply shield enhancements to attack and damage
Shield Slam: Shield Bash includes Bull Rush
Shot On The Run: Move before, after ranged attack
Sickening Critical: Critical hit causes foe sickened for 1 min
Snatch Arrows: Catch ranged weapons
Spellbreaker: AOO on foe failed defensive casting
Spirited Charge: x2 damage (x3 lance) on mounted charge
Spring Attack: Move before, after melee attack w/out AOO
Staggering Critical: Critical hit staggers for 1d4+1 rd (DC 27 Fort staggered for 1 rd)
Stand Still: CMB check to halt foe movement
Stunning Critical: Critical hit stuns for 1d4 rd (DC 27 Fort staggered)
Stunning Fist: Struck foe stunned for 1 rd 4/dy (DC 19 Fort neg)
Tiring Critical: Critical hit fatigues foe
Trample: Mounted overrun unavoidable, bonus hoof attack
Two-Weapon Defense: +1 AC wielding two weapons (+2 fighting defensively)
Two-Weapon Fighting: Reduce on-hand penalty by 2, off-hand by 6
Two-Weapon Rend: Extra 1d10+3 HP from double hit
Unseat: Bull Rush after lance hit to unseat mounted foe
Vital Strike: 2x base damage
Weapon Training: +4/+3/+2/+1 attack, damage, CMB, and CMD w/weapons from chosen groups
Whirlwind Attack: Attack all foes in reach
